blogPost.title:
At $7.1 trillion, the combined market cap of Apple, Microsoft, Amazon, and Google is greater than the GDP of every country in the world with the exception of the US and China.

$AAPL $MSFT $AMZN $GOOGL

Charting via @ycharts https://t.co/4Z12avo92A
blogPost.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text:
苹果、微软、亚马逊和谷歌的总市值为7.1万亿美元，比世界上除美国和中国以外的所有国家的GDP都要大。

$AAPL $MSFT $AMZN $GOOGL

通过@ycharts绘制图表 https://t.co/4Z12avo92A

蘋果、微軟、亞馬遜和谷歌的總市值爲7.1萬億美元，比世界上除美國和中國以外的所有國家的GDP都要大。

$AAPL $MSFT $AMZN $GOOGL

通過@ycharts繪製圖表 https://t.co/4Z12avo92A

previous.excerpt:
Hey everyone,

I’ve been eyeing MSFT for a long time and hate myself for not buying when it was
around 130.

My feeling was it’s undervalued and they have a lot of good revenue streams
especially after their cloud business has been taking off.

My goal was to invest around 10k into it and hold long…
previous.title: MSFT as a long term hold

localize.title: 长期持有MSFT
localize.the_new_excerpt:
嘿，大家好。

我一直在关注MSFT，恨自己当初没有买入。
130左右。

我的感觉是它的价值被低估了，他们有很多好的收入来源
尤其是在他们的云计算业务有了起色之后。

我的目标是投资1万左右，长期持有...

localize.title: 長期持有MSFT
localize.the_new_excerpt:
嘿，大家好。

我的感覺是它的價值被低估了，他們有很多好的收入來源
尤其是在他們的雲計算業務有了起色之後。

我的目標是投資1萬左右，長期持有...
